page.title: 12FORD END CHURCH.
page.content: There is a church in our village.It is called{St. John the Evangelist.}The church is over 100 years old.The chancel is been knocked down but they have to take the bricks down one by one or the whole church will come down because the foundation was not very good.The current work is costing Â£40,000.It was first demolished just 20 years after it was built in 1881 at a cost of Â£5,000 but that time it was decided to restore the chancel.Work started at the beginning of the year 1985 and Rev.G. Sanders is hoping to have his church back by September.At the moment services are being held in the village school.
